# packageVersion

## Summary

Identify the version of a package.


## Description

A packageVersion is useful for identification purposes and for indicating later changes of the package version.


## Metadata

`https://rdf.spdx.org/v3/Software/packageVersion`

|---|---|
| Name | packageVersion |
| Nature | DataProperty |
| Range | xsd:string |
